content.intro: Welcome to Boring Tools, where we make the boring parts of your online life simple and efficient.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: At Boring Tools, we believe that everyday online tasks shouldn't be complicated. Our mission is to create straightforward, user-friendly tools that solve common problems without unnecessary complexity. We focus on simplicity, efficiency, and accessibility.

story.title: Our Story
story.text: Boring Tools was founded in 2022 by a group of developers who were tired of flashy but ineffective web tools. We wanted to create solutions that just work â€“ without ads, without sign-ups, and without tracking. What started as a small collection of utilities has grown into a comprehensive suite of tools used by millions of people worldwide.

list.heading: Simplicity
list.text: We eliminate complexity and focus on what matters.

list.heading: Privacy
list.text: We respect your data and privacy. No unnecessary tracking or data collection.

list.heading: Accessibility
list.text: Our tools are designed to be usable by everyone, regardless of technical skill or ability.

list.heading: Quality
list.text: We're committed to creating reliable, high-quality tools that work consistently.

team.title: Our Team
team.text: We're a diverse team of developers, designers, and problem-solvers based around the world. United by our passion for creating useful tools, we work together to make the web a more efficient place.

contact.text: Have questions or want to learn more about us?
